text: Alexander Sarkissian (born April 3, 1990) is an American professional tennis player of Armenian descent.http://www.atpworldtour.com/Tennis/Players/Sa/A/Alexander- Sarkissian.aspx He won his first ATP Challenger title at the 2015 Gimcheon Open ATP Challenger in South Korea in June 2015. ==ATP Challenger Tour finals== ===Singles: 1 (1–0)=== {|class=wikitable style=font-size:97% !Legend |-bgcolor=moccasin |} {|class=wikitable style=font-size:97% !Legend (Singles) |-bgcolor=moccasin |Challengers (1) |} {|class=wikitable style=font-size:97% !Outcome !No. !Date !Tournament !Surface !Opponent !Score |-bgcolor=moccasin |bgcolor=98FB98|Winner |1. |June 7, 2015 |Gimcheon, South Korea |Hard | Connor Smith |7–6(7–5), 6–4 |-bgcolor=CFFCFF |} ==References== ==External links== * * Category:American male tennis players Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Glendale, California Category:Armenian American Category:American people of Armenian descent Category:Tennis people from California Category:Armenian-American tennis players
title: Alexander Sarkissian
